Release 3.0.3.1 - 2015-06-02

Type Changes By
Fix WaarpShutdownHook not created if already created before (dependencies with Gateway Ftp) Frederic Bregier

Release 3.0.3 - 2015-06-01

Type Changes By
MOVE and MOVERENAME tasks should create subdirs if necessary Bruno Carlin
Make FileUtils.copy() handle empty files Bruno Carlin
Forces the destination path of a copy task to end with a slash Bruno Carlin
Fix following UpdatedInfo kept in Json Frederic Bregier
